resources.string: We are obsessed with feedback. \nIt will help us improve and innovate

● Keep Safe App team works dayin and dayout to ensure that your data is not stored or leaked.

 ● We are not storing your security data on any server, rather we are using a local encrypted database to store the details for your convinience, hence providing you with end to end encryption and ensure you the security to the fullest. 

 ● We are not permitting the user to screenshot the application using the default screenshot functionality.

 ● We do not gaurantee security about any third party screen capturing applications.

 ● This app also feautures the hide/unhide functionality where you can hide this app from the application list and thus adding it to your privacy and security. 

 ● To unhide the app you can you can dial your pin in the dialer suffixing it with a "#".
